about_the_game:
Explore two unique dungeons and test your skills in leagues. Engage in intense match-3 battles with a team of warriors, combining strategy and power to overcome your enemies.

Some features and content are reserved for the full game, giving you a glimpse of the expansive world that awaits.

Dive in, and if you enjoy what you see, be sure to check out the game when it's released!

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted are over the age of 18. 

The game contains explicit adult themes and language, including nudity, violence, BDSM and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.
